bug.author: myungjoo
bug.description:
<denchmark-code>$ ldd /usr/lib/nnstreamer/filters/libnnstreamer_filter_tensorflow.so ... libpython2.7.so.1.0 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpython2.7.so.1.0 (0x00007f6fd1257000) ... </denchmark-code>
And nnstreamer-tensorflow.deb (and tensorflow-dev.deb) does not declare its dependency on libpython2.7 This caused the secondary bug of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer-example/issues/21>https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer-example/issues/21</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1209>#1209</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
